snippet: A truck driver from Georgia was charged on Saturday with causing a crash between his semi-trailer and a van that killed a comedian and critically injured comic actor Tracy Morgan, U.S. prosecutors said....

headline.print_headline: Truck Driver Charged in Crash That Killed Comedian, Injured Comic Tracy Morgan
headline.main: Truck Driver Charged in Crash That Killed Comedian, Injured Comic Tracy Morgan

lead_paragraph: A truck driver from Georgia was charged on Saturday with causing a crash between his semi-trailer and a van that killed a comedian and critically injured comic actor Tracy Morgan, U.S. prosecutors said.
